translation.main-subtitle: Maganin sarrafa tallace-tallace na dandamali da yawa
translation.intro-text: Aikace-aikacen DA ServePro yana taimaka wa masu shaguna da ma'aikata su bi ayyukan tallace-tallace yadda ya kamata. Ya dace da F&B, dillali da ayyuka.
translation.feature2-text: Bin diddigin lokaci-lokaci akan duk na'urori
translation.feature3-text: Taƙaitaccen kuɗin shiga, odar da kayayyakin da aka fi siyar da su ta atomatik
translation.feature4-text: Saita takamaiman ayyuka da izini ga kowane ma'aikaci
translation.feature5-title: Aiki Daidai na Dandamali Da Yawa
translation.feature5-text: Bayanan suna aiki daidai kuma ana adana su lafiya
translation.feature6-text: Rufaffiyar Layer 2, mai shi ne kawai zai iya shiga
translation.address: Adireshi: Titin D1 52, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Birnin Ho Chi Minh
translation.footer-text: © 2025 DA ServePro. Duk haƙƙoƙin suna kiyayye
